title: Australia shooting: Two officers killed in rural town, local media says
description: People have been asked to avoid the scene, which has been described as an "active and ongoing incident".
content:
Local primary school 'still in lockdown'

title: Jack Draper forced to dig deep against dogged Gómez after on-court sickness
description: Jack Draper beat a bout of vomiting as well as Federico Agustín Gómez, while Cameron Norrie also reached round two after Sebastian Korda retired after two sets
content: After 53 days without experiencing the tension, physicality and adrenaline of competing at the highest level of his sport, Jack Draper returned to competition at the US Open with a bruising first-round win that ­illustrated the challenge of ­entering... [5097 chars]
